subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jay Pandolfo capitalized on a bad night by Pittsburgh goalie Marc-André Fleury to score the tie-breaking goal for the Devils in a 5-2 win against the Penguins Friday night.
snippet: Jay Pandolfo capitalized on a bad night by Pittsburgh goalie Marc-André Fleury to score the tie-breaking goal for the Devils in a 5-2 win against the Penguins Friday night.
